elements.name: Aborted

changeLog.description: Removed defined_by relationship with Undefined
Added defined_by relationship with Blocked

elements.description: The milestone will not be reached.

elements.name: Blocked

changeLog.description: Added defined_by relationship with On Hold
Removed defined_by relationship with In Progress

elements.description: The milestone cannot be reached until whatever is blocking progress has been resolved.

changeLog.description: Added action (ID: AI.5): 'This is a risk related to the hardware.'
Changed annotation type from Action (ID: AI.5) to Risk (ID: R.3).

annotations.text: This is a risk related to the hardware.

elements.name: In Progress

changeLog.description: Added defined_by relationship with Undefined

elements.description: Progress is being made towards this milestone.

elements.name: Not Started
elements.description: Progress towards this milestone has not been started.

elements.name: On Hold

changeLog.description: Added defined_by relationship with Finished
Removed defined_by relationship with In Progress

elements.description: Progress towards this milestone has been temporarily stopped.

elements.name: Person

changeLog.description: Created element: 'Person' of type: Person
Added description: 'A person who performs a function of, and therefore forms a part of, the system of interest.'
Added action (ID: AI.3): 'This is an assumption about the person.'
Changed annotation type from Action (ID: AI.3) to Assumption (ID: AS.1).

elements.description: A person who performs a function of, and therefore forms a part of, the system of interest.

annotations.text: This is an assumption about the person.

elements.name: Product

changeLog.description: Created element: 'Product' of type: Product
Changed description: added: 'An article that is the result of an action or process.'
Added lesson (ID: L.1): 'This is a lesson related to the product.'

elements.description: An article that is the result of an action or process.

annotations.text: This is a lesson related to the product.

elements.name: Project

changeLog.description: Created element: 'Project' of type: Project
Added built_from relationship with Product
Added built_from relationship with System of Interest
Changed description: added: 'An undertaking with pre-specified objectives, magnitude and duration.'

elements.description: An undertaking with pre-specified objectives, magnitude and duration.

elements.name: Service

changeLog.description: Added action (ID: AI.4): 'This is an opportunity related to the service.'
Changed annotation type from Action (ID: AI.4) to Opportunity (ID: O.2).

elements.description: A service provided by a service provider.

annotations.text: This is an opportunity related to the service.

changeLog.description: Created element: 'Stakeholder 1' of type: Stakeholder
Changed colour from undefined to #16a5a5
Added responsible_for relationship with Project
Added responsible_for relationship with Product
Added responsible_for relationship with System of Interest
Added responsible_for relationship with System
Created element: 'Stakeholder 2' of type: Stakeholder
Changed colour from undefined to #7b64ff
Added responsible_for relationship with System of Systems

elements.name: System

changeLog.description: Added built_from relationship with Person

elements.description: A system (either a black box or built from other elements).

elements.name: System of Interest

changeLog.description: Added description: 'The system whose life cycle is under consideration.'
Added action (ID: AI.2): 'This is an action related to the system of interest.'

elements.description: The system whose life cycle is under consideration.

annotations.text: This is an action related to the system of interest.

elements.name: System of Systems

changeLog.description: Added description: 'A system of systems is a collection of task-oriented or dedicated systems that pool their resources and capabilities together to create a new, more complex system which offers more functionality and performance than simply the sum of the constituent systems.'

Changed description: 'A (-system of systems is a) collection of task-oriented or dedicated systems that pool their resources and capabilities together to create a new, more complex system which offers more functionality and performance than simply the sum of the constituent systems.'

elements.description: A collection of task-oriented or dedicated systems that pool their resources and capabilities together to create a new, more complex system which offers more functionality and performance than simply the sum of the constituent systems.

elements.name: Undefined
elements.description: The milestone status has not been defined.
